item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-04-13
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Peet's Coffee & Tea (Newton Centre) (776 Beacon Street, Langley Road, Newton). #
  • RT: Signs of spring in the courtyard next to my class at Harvard. /via @ckirsten #
  • I signed up for @StartupDigest because the world needs more entrepreneurs in every city across the globe! Join us: #
  • Really want one of these - #
  • I'm at Cambridge, 1. (Harvard Square) (27 Church Street, Cambridge) w/ 2 others. #
  • Having a lager from the faraway land of Brooklyn, LCD Soundsystem on the stereo, thin crust pepperoni pizza has been downed. Life is good. #
  • RT @TechCrunch SpringSource Acquires UK-based Open Source Company Rabbit Technologies #
  • I'm at Domenic's Italian Bakery & Deli (987 Main Street, Waltham). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
